get.description: Retrieve individual listings for a given lineup ordered by start time (listDateTime) and channel number; unless using the search parameter, in which case they will be ordered by search term relevance.

parameters.description: API Key supplied by TvMedia.ca
parameters.name: TvMediaApiKey

parameters.description: Lineup ID.
parameters.name: LineupID

parameters.description: UTC start time in ISO8601. Defaults to current date and time.
parameters.name: Start

parameters.description: UTC end time in ISO8601. Defaults to 'start' time +4 hours.
parameters.name: End

parameters.description: Set a timezone or time offset for listing times (listDateTime property). Defaults to UTC, accepts time offsets (+/-HH:MM) or named time zones (see IANA Time Zone Database). If an invalid value is set, listDateTime will be returned as empty. NOTE: this parameter does not affect input values; start and end times must still be provided in UTC.
parameters.name: TimeZone

parameters.description: Include only channel(s) with this number, single or array values accepted. sub channel numbers can be hyphenated to the end of the string: e.g. 1-2 for sub channel 2 of channel 1 (use the channel.number property , NOT channel.channelNumber property).
parameters.name: Channel

parameters.description: Exclude channels by number, single or array values accepted. sub channel numbers can be hyphenated to the end of the string: e.g. 1-2 for sub channel 2 of channel 1 (use the channel.number property, NOT the channel.channelNumber property).
parameters.name: ExcludeChan

parameters.description: Lowest channel. sub channel numbers can be hyphenated to the end of the string: e.g. 1-2 for sub channel 2 of channel 1.
parameters.name: StartChan

parameters.description: Highest channel. sub channel numbers can be hyphenated to the end of the string: e.g. 1-2 for sub channel 2 of channel 1. In general this parameter should rarely be used, for shaping the grid size see the 'maxchan' parameter.
parameters.name: EndChan

parameters.description: Filter by station ID. Array or single value accepted. Station ID's can be found in listings, or by using the /lineups API.
parameters.name: Station

parameters.description: Filter out station IDs; array or single value accepted. Station ID's can be found in listings, or by using the /lineups API.
parameters.name: ExcludeStation

parameters.description: search value: can be a show, episode, movie, team, league, person, etc. Results will be sorted by relevance rather than time.
parameters.name: Search

parameters.description: Include only these show type ID(s), array or single values accepted. Must be URL encoded. For a list of possible show type's and their ID's see /genres/shows, or the showTypeID property of a listing object.
parameters.name: ShowType

parameters.description: Exclude only these show type ID(s), array or single values accepted. Must be URL encoded. For a list of possible show type's and their ID's see /genres/shows, or the showTypeID property of a listing object.
parameters.name: ExcludeShowType

parameters.description: ListingID, array or single values accepted. to return a single listing it should be used in combination with a stationID (station parameter).
parameters.name: Id

parameters.description: Get only sports listings of type sportTypeID. Array or single values accepted. For a list of possible values see /genres/sports.
parameters.name: SportType

parameters.description: Get only sports listings in the given league ID(s). Array or single values accepted. For a list of possible values see /leagues.
parameters.name: League

parameters.description: Filter by teams playing by name(teams.longName). Array or single values accepted, for a list of possible values see /leagues/teams. (NOTE: league parameter is required when using this parameter).
parameters.name: Team

parameters.description: Only displays listings which are starting on or after the given start time. No value necessary.
parameters.name: NotYetStarted

parameters.description: Get sporting events only. No value necessary.
parameters.name: SportEventsOnly

parameters.description: Only displays listings which are flagged as being broadcast with Descriptive Video. No value necessary.
parameters.name: DescriptiveVideoOnly

parameters.description: Only displays live listings. No value necessary.
parameters.name: LiveOnly

parameters.description: Get new shows only. No value necessary.
parameters.name: NewShowsOnly

parameters.description: Defaults to 1 (allowed). Set to 0 to hide adult content.
parameters.name: AdultContent

parameters.description: Displays the Artwork information. Set to 1 to include, 1 is default. 0 to hide (will improve performance).
parameters.name: DisplayArtwork

parameters.description: Set level of detail for response. values are 'full' or 'brief', defaults to 'full'. 'full' will include all properties, 'brief' will exclude optional properties.
parameters.name: Detail

get.description:
Returns a URL to the requested video. [Video Format Specs](https://developer.iva-api.com/docs/v1/video-formats)

**Formats:** MP4 = 4, HLS = 11, Dash = 14, HSS = 12, HDS = 13

**MP4 KbRate:** 80, 212, 450, 750, 1500, 2500(HD sources only), 5000 (sources >=  1080p)  

**Adaptive Min/Max rate:** 212000, 350000, 600000, 1200000, 2000000, 2500000, 3500000  

 `URLs requested with a Demo account will always return max 750 kbps video.  Full commercial account required for higher bitrates.`

Detail.description: Set level of detail for response. values are 'full' or 'brief', defaults to 'brief'. 'full' will include all properties, 'brief' will exclude optional properties.

AdultContent.description: Defaults to 1 (allowed). Set to 0 to hide adult content.

Channel.description: Include only channel(s) with this number, single or array values accepted. sub channel numbers can be hyphenated to the end of the string: e.g. 1-2 for sub channel 2 of channel 1 (use the channel.number property , NOT channel.channelNumber property).

DescriptiveVideoOnly.description: Only displays listings which are flagged as being broadcast with Descriptive Video. No value necessary.

Detail.description: Set level of detail for response. values are 'full' or 'brief', defaults to 'full'. 'full' will include all properties, 'brief' will exclude optional properties.

DisplayArtwork.description: Displays the Artwork information. Set to 1 to include, 1 is default. 0 to hide (will improve performance).

End.description: UTC end time in ISO8601. Defaults to 'start' time +4 hours.

EndChan.description: Highest channel. sub channel numbers can be hyphenated to the end of the string: e.g. 1-2 for sub channel 2 of channel 1. In general this parameter should rarely be used, for shaping the grid size see the 'maxchan' parameter.

ExcludeChan.description: Exclude channels by number, single or array values accepted. sub channel numbers can be hyphenated to the end of the string: e.g. 1-2 for sub channel 2 of channel 1 (use the channel.number property, NOT the channel.channelNumber property).

ExcludeShowType.description: Exclude only these show type ID(s), array or single values accepted. Must be URL encoded. For a list of possible show type's and their ID's see /genres/shows, or the showTypeID property of a listing object.

ExcludeStation.description: Filter out station IDs; array or single value accepted. Station ID's can be found in listings, or by using the /lineups API.

Id.description: ListingID, array or single values accepted. to return a single listing it should be used in combination with a stationID (station parameter).

League.description: Get only sports listings in the given league ID(s). Array or single values accepted. For a list of possible values see /leagues.

LeagueID.description: League ID. See /leagues for a list of all available sports leagues.

LineupID.description: Lineup ID. Lineups can be found through the /TvMedia/lineups method.

LiveOnly.description: Only displays live listings. No value necessary.

NewShowsOnly.description: Get new shows only. No value necessary.

NotYetStarted.description: Only displays listings which are starting on or after the given start time. No value necessary.

Search.description: search value: can be a show, episode, movie, team, league, person, etc. Results will be sorted by relevance rather than time.

ShowType.description: Include only these show type ID(s), array or single values accepted. Must be URL encoded. For a list of possible show type's and their ID's see /genres/shows, or the showTypeID property of a listing object.

SportEventsOnly.description: Get sporting events only. No value necessary.

SportType.description: Get only sports listings of type sportTypeID. Array or single values accepted. For a list of possible values see /genres/sports.

StartChan.description: Lowest channel. sub channel numbers can be hyphenated to the end of the string: e.g. 1-2 for sub channel 2 of channel 1.

Team.description: Filter by teams playing by name(teams.longName). Array or single values accepted, for a list of possible values see /leagues/teams. (NOTE: league parameter is required when using this parameter).

AdultContent.description: Defaults to 1 (allowed). Set to 0 to hide adult content.

Channel.description: Include only channel(s) with this number, single or array values accepted. sub channel numbers can be hyphenated to the end of the string: e.g. 1-2 for sub channel 2 of channel 1 (use the channel.number property , NOT channel.channelNumber property).

DescriptiveVideoOnly.description: Only displays listings which are flagged as being broadcast with Descriptive Video. No value necessary.

Detail.description: Set level of detail for response. values are 'full' or 'brief', defaults to 'full'. 'full' will include all properties, 'brief' will exclude optional properties.

DisplayArtwork.description: Displays the Artwork information. Set to 1 to include, 1 is default. 0 to hide (will improve performance).

End.description: UTC end time in ISO8601. Defaults to 'start' time +4 hours.

EndChan.description: Highest channel. sub channel numbers can be hyphenated to the end of the string: e.g. 1-2 for sub channel 2 of channel 1. In general this parameter should rarely be used, for shaping the grid size see the 'maxchan' parameter.

ExcludeChan.description: Exclude channels by number, single or array values accepted. sub channel numbers can be hyphenated to the end of the string: e.g. 1-2 for sub channel 2 of channel 1 (use the channel.number property, NOT the channel.channelNumber property).

ExcludeShowType.description: Exclude only these show type ID(s), array or single values accepted. Must be URL encoded. For a list of possible show type's and their ID's see /genres/shows, or the showTypeID property of a listing object.

Id.description: ListingID, array or single values accepted. to return a single listing it should be used in combination with a stationID (station parameter).

League.description: Get only sports listings in the given league ID(s). Array or single values accepted. For a list of possible values see /leagues.

LiveOnly.description: Only displays live listings. No value necessary.

NewShowsOnly.description: Get new shows only. No value necessary.

NotYetStarted.description: Only displays listings which are starting on or after the given start time. No value necessary.
